#summary This document covers the fundamentals of building applications using JSC3D.

= Getting Started with JSC3D =

_JSC3D_ is very easy to setup and requires only a few lines of code to initialize.

As _JSC3D_ uses _*[https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/HTML/Canvas canvas]*_ element for rendering, the first step is to declare a canvas with non-zero size in the _*body*_ segment of the page.

{{{
<body>
    <canvas id="cv" width=640 height=480></canvas>
</body>
}}}
